documents.document: @T_A_Gurit @chhopsky @overwatchleague I think ultimately you’d end up with it all on MLG, but from a business perspective I’d like to see numbers where there’s little room for manufacturing them.
@Siignal @overwatchleague No that seems fair. I’d like to see a reason to watch outside twitch though - I’d love to be watching on my 52” 4K tv right now but no MLG app that I’m aware of
@Siignal @overwatchleague You mean test broadcast platform features or in-game overlays etc? If the former that makes sense.
@chhopsky @overwatchleague I’m talking dynamic stat overlays, select your own camera etc. Heck, I’d pay for that functionality on games I’m into.

@chhopsky @overwatchleague True that, but interested to see if platform migration really works. I’m more curious because you don’t see viewership stats on their owned platform. That said, if the https://t.co/L2xM6Tq33Z platform brings unique functionality then I’m all for watching there.
Why is the @overwatchleague not on Twitch? Surprised they’d shut that market off considering the significant promotion they’d get.
@Esports_News_UK https://t.co/hr7NMin8NS

Used to adore the playcounts feature in iTunes. Hall & Oates ‘You Make My Dreams Come True’ was played more than 800 times in a year.
What’s most impressive is that I only went mad listening to ‘My Number’ by @foals in September.
An eclectic mix this year. #2017Wrapped https://t.co/dSSI9B6FMv
I’ve listened to 15 days 23 mins of music on @Spotify this year. Down from 27 days in 2016...
@PhoneShopTweets remains one of the most underrated shows out there. True to the point. Fond memories of working in phone retail in early years!

The player summit was held in the last 72hrs. On the agenda, player conduct. I'm guessing some didn't get the memo or bother showing up. https://t.co/w3K0BQlaJN
@Meekel soundtrack to SF I hear.

@JaydaBF @realDonaldTrump The ethnic, cultural and religious diversity we see within Esports (both players and fans) is a thing of beauty. Improve the gender situation and we’re onto something even more incredible.

Absolutely zero tolerance for the rubbish @JaydaBF spouts and @realDonaldTrump endorses. These are not commonly held views in Britain. I’m proud to be part of a culturally and religiously diverse country. That’s what makes us great.
Esports fans bitch about sports teams entering the space, but dammit they know how to build a fanbase. Lots of endemic teams could learn a chunk from looking to them.
This would’ve been a relatively cheap competition to run if they’d have targeted London too. Great content opportunity, chance to embrace their targeted territory etc.
Want to create a relationship with newly adopted home fans? Try excluding them from promotions. How anyone thought this was sensible is ridiculous. https://t.co/eHx5SbL8Br
My Uber driver is wearing @TOMFORD Tuscan Leather. I’m in the wrong job.
@FatherRussell It’s the chairs. Does it to us all. Hence why I sat behind the desk...good to meet you all!
Hosting Nike today. Wearing Adidas. Oops. Great to have @KezBrown down to the arena demonstrating his @EASPORTSFIFA skills! https://t.co/VgAVFp0rkd
@MrNashor @ProphecyTeam @team_infused @TeamEnVyUs @exceL @brookers_mb @penny_france She can’t be professional when dogs are involved. We’d get no work out of her.
@MrNashor @ProphecyTeam @team_infused @TeamEnVyUs @exceL I’m Head of Doggos. Fighting @brookers_mb for the honour.

Can’t wait to welcome the UK SFV community to the Arena this Friday. @ProphecyTeam vs @team_infused , @TeamEnVyUs vs @exceL semi-Finals and Finals on ONE NIGHT. It’s going to be 🦄🤹🏻‍♂️🎉 #EliteSeries https://t.co/8UWELhhdp3

@fimmz @ESLAustralia @CyberGamerAUS @ESEA @GfinityAU It doesn’t stop that. The benefit of expanded rosters means you can field teams in two events if it comes to a crunch.
@mannyanekal @ArenaofValor You don’t have AOV there yet? @TeamLiquid have a team. We’ve had it in EU for best part of 3 months IIRC

@EsportsOnset Montivation. I’m with you for what it’s worth. https://t.co/1WEqmWH19x

@MoneyTalkRL @RL_Lauty @Wrong_Way_Woody I know all the details. Any pro in the top 30 was not eligible, or anyone contracted to a team. Players then had to indicate they were interested and come to terms with the teams.
@MoneyTalkRL @RL_Lauty @Wrong_Way_Woody I do.
@brijschuil @Jose_Arrogantio @HSouthwellFE @FIAFormulaE @lookingspiffy I haven’t been there for over a year. I’m not Best placed to answer this.

@WSOLogan Haha nice segue.
@anilp228 Electronic Arts. There’s a reason for the name.
@WSOLogan The best don’t always win. The beauty of sports.
@Frag_RL @Gfinity @BrendonLeigh72 Pretty solid effort though! First Esports pro to be pro in 2 or more titles at once?
@WSOLogan It works both ways. Arsenal’s invincibles were pretty average in the cups...lots of draws too.
@WSOLogan I’d argue this to my grave. 15/16 warriors over everything. The flaws of the American sports system.

Reading through feedback on the #F1esports finals in Abu Dhabi. Massive congrats to the teams at @Gfinity for delivering an outstanding live event, managed and produced beautifully in a unique setting. Best team in the business. Huge congrats to @BrendonLeigh72 on your win. https://t.co/zZYqBWzgQe

Personally really like the new #f1logo, but design is subjective. Feels much more progressive and a positive sign for the Championship. For me, the old one had font that looked like it had been run through InDesign’s trace tool...#artworkjoke https://t.co/2lRhSIu2rp
